con:testCase.name: AG08-Credit access
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for AG08-Credit access

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' and ROWNUM = 1

con:property.con:name: expectedStatusReason
con:property.con:value: User not authorized to perform requested operation

con:property.con:name: actualStatusReason
con:property.con:value: User not authorized to perform requested operation

con:config.con:query: select A.MESSAGEID,C.TRANSACTIONSID,B.PAYMENTINFOID ,C.PAYMENTSTATUS,C.PAYMENTTYPE,C.ENDTOENDID from MESSAGE A,PAYMENTINFO B, TRANSACTIONS C where A.MESSAGEID = B.FK_MESSAGEID and B.PAYMENTINFOID = C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID and A.MESSAGEIDENTIFICATION LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%'

select * from statusreason S, STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF SI where S.STATUSREASONID = SI.FK_STATUSREASONID and (S.FK_TRANSACTIONID = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}' OR S.FK_Paymentinfoid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PAYMENTINFOID[1]}' or s.FK_messageid = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/MESSAGEID[1]}') order by CODE asc

con:elements.con:expectedValue: User not authorized to perform requested operation

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: 453489 AG08 PAIN 565944 187503 453489 User not authorized to perform requested operation
